Welcome to Wharf’s documentation!¶

Wharf is a command-line tool used to simplify Docker development environments. It combines build and runtime Docker configuration for one image/container in a YAML environment file.

Wharf is primarily meant to be used as a development tool, but can also be used to produce production images in a continuous integration environment. In the Naz environment, Wharf is usually also installed inside a container to provide container-specific helper functions.

To contribute to the project visit https://github.com/NazarethCollege/wharf Pull requests are welcome!
